ObjectClass.Name: Cthulhu (Octoligo)
ObjectClass.Description:
CTHULHU/OCTOLIGO: Biological heavy-support armor Slow, high-impact brawler Devastating vs aircraft and swarms Critically vulnerable to burst damage
Upgrades: S-Tech: Comm Spike L-Tech: Progenerate Sepi+Pharo pair

Objective.Name: Move
Objective.Details: \Move to specified location\ \Move Speed: 1.8, MaxInc: 30\Vision Range: 42, Aggro Radius: G 24, A 35

Objective.Name: Attack
Objective.Details: Attack target or Attack-Move to location\ \[Weapons Avg Damage/10secs]\Gnd: 200, R 16, SR 4, Sta A\Air: 80, R 30, SR 15, Sta A

Objective.Name: Stop
Objective.Details: \Interrupt current objective\ \Return to idling or hold fire

Objective.Name: Patrol
Objective.Details: Hold CTRL and select up to 5 points to\continuously patrol around\Target one of your own units to HOLD\current position or select a single\location to HOLD that position

Objective.Name: Teleport
Objective.Details: Teleport to a specified location\or self-teleport within LOS range\Teleporters extend range and negate cost\ \Blocked by Temporal Soliton Shield (TSS)

Objective.Name: Chronoport
Objective.Details: Chronoport to a specified point in time\ \Recharges Shields 50%\Must not have a TSS

Objective.Name: Chronoport
Objective.Details: Not Available\ Requires C-Tech\ upgrade at the MOUND

Objective.Name: Regenerate Shields
Objective.Details: \Fully restores shields\ \Process duration: 16 s\Avoid using near combat

Objective.Name: Meiotic Progenesis
Objective.Details: \Create an SEPI and a PHARO

Objective.Name: Meiotic Progenesis
Objective.Details: Not Available\ Requires L-Tech\ upgrade at the MOUND

Objective.Name: Warp Spasm
Objective.Details: 20 s duration special attack mode\ \2X ground only damage; 2.5X move speed \-70% defense \No energy based abilities

Objective.Name: Comm Spike
Objective.Details: Damage the target and disable \its command link until healed\ \Damage: 30, Range: 40 vs all

Objective.Name: Comm Spike
Objective.Details: Not Available\ Requires S-Tech\ upgrade at the MOUND

ObjectClass.Name: Enraged Cthulhu (Octoligo)
ObjectClass.Description:
ENRAGED CTHULHU/OCTOLIGO: Warp Spasm heavy-support armor Fast, ultra high-impact brawler Devastating on attack but lacks defense
Reverts after 20 s

Objective.Name: Move
Objective.Details: \Move to specified location\ \Move Speed: 4.5, MaxInc: 30\Vision Range: 30, Aggro Radius: 30

Objective.Name: Attack
Objective.Details: Attack target or Attack-Move to location\ \[Weapons Avg Damage/10secs]\Gnd: 400, R 16, SR 4, Sta C

Objective.Name: Stop
Objective.Details: \Interrupt current objective\ \Return to idling or hold fire

Objective.Name: Patrol
Objective.Details: Hold CTRL and select up to 5 points to\continuously patrol around\Target one of your own units to HOLD\current position or select a single\location to HOLD that position

Objective.Name: Teleport
Objective.Details: Teleport to a specified location\or self-teleport within LOS range\Teleporters extend range and negate cost\ \Blocked by Temporal Soliton Shield (TSS)

Objective.Name: Chronoport
Objective.Details: Chronoport to a specified point in time\ \Recharges Shields 50%\Must not have a TSS

Objective.Name: Chronoport
Objective.Details: Not Available\ Requires C-Tech\ upgrade at the MOUND

ObjectClass.Name: Octoligo (Wreckage)
ObjectClass.Description:
This Octoligo is dead Beware of internal explosions
Duration: 150 s Explosive for 60 s, 480 damage
